TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlSchemaValidator extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构验证引擎。

span.span: Represents an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) Schema validation engine.

summary.span: 不能继承 类。

span.span: The class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 这样会危及你的代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构 （包括内联架构） 的本质上就容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不要在不受信任的情况下接受它们。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 架构验证错误消息和异常可能会公开有关内容模型或架构文件的 URI 路径的敏感信息。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 请注意不要公开此信息来不受信任的调用方。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. 类提供了一种高效、高性能的机制，通过基于推送的方式针对 XML 架构验证 XML 数据。The class provides an efficient, high-performance mechanism to validate XML data against XML schemas in a push-based manner. 例如，使用 类可以就地验证 XML 信息集，而不必将其序列化为 XML 文档，然后使用验证 XML 读取器重新分析该文档。For example, the class allows you to validate an XML infoset in-place without having to serialize it as an XML document and then reparse the document using a validating XML reader. 类还可以用于在自定义 XML 数据源或作为一种方式生成验证 XML 写入器生成验证引擎。The class can also be used to build validation engines over custom XML data sources or as a way to build a validating XML writer. 有关详细信息类，请参阅[XmlSchemaValidator 基于推送的验证](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation.md)主题。For more information about the class, see the [XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based Validation](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation.md) topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 和验证标志对象不是设置为默认值。The and validation flags of an object are not set be default. 此外，属性对象是`null`默认情况下。Additionally, the property of an object is `null` by default. 因此，在中引用的外部架构包括，导入或重新定义元素则不解析默认情况下。As a result, external schemas referenced in include, imports, or redefine elements are not resolved by default. ## Examples 以下示例将验证`contosoBooks.xml`文件针对`contosoBooks.xsd`架构。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public XmlSchemaValidator (System.Xml.XmlNameTable nameTable, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver namespaceResolver, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags validationFlags);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.XmlNameTable nameTable, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver namespaceResolver, valuetype System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags validationFlags) cil managed
Public Sub New (nameTable As XmlNameTable, schemas As XmlSchemaSet, namespaceResolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver, validationFlags As XmlSchemaValidationFlags)

public: XmlSchemaValidator(System::Xml::XmlNameTable ^ nameTable, System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ schemas, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ namespaceResolver, System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaValidationFlags validationFlags);

param.name: nameTable
param.span: 一个 对象，其中包含作为原子化字符串的元素名和特性名。

span.span: An object containing element and attribute names as atomized strings.

param.name: schemas
param.span: 一个 对象，包含用于验证的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: An object containing the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas used for validation.

param.name: namespaceResolver
param.span: 一个 对象，用于解析在验证过程中遇到的命名空间。

span.span: An object used for resolving namespaces encountered during validation.

param.name: validationFlags
param.span: 一个 值，指定架构验证选项。

span.span: An value specifying schema validation options.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明构造函数。The following are important notes to consider when using the constructor. - 内容参数复制到内部对象时或设置验证选项。The contents of the parameter are copied into an internal object when the or the validation options are set. 因此，更改为输入验证过程的对象不会影响的验证结果。As a result, changes to the input object during validation do not affect the outcome of validation. - 如果未编译指定的参数，其调用方法。If the parameter specified is not compiled, its method is called. - 参数是用于验证尤其重要`xs:QName`类型。The parameter is especially important for validating `xs:QName` types. 类不会复制在范围内的命名空间对象但而是保存对它的引用。The class does not copy the in-scope namespaces from the object but instead holds a reference to it. 这允许新的命名空间添加到在验证过程的对象。This allows new namespaces to be added to the object during the validation process. > [!IMPORTANT] > 和验证标志对象不是设置为默认值。The and validation flags of an object are not set be default. 此外，属性对象是`null`默认情况下。Additionally, the property of an object is `null` by default. 因此，在中引用的外部架构包括，导入或重新定义元素则不解析默认情况下。As a result, external schemas referenced in include, imports, or redefine elements are not resolved by default. ## Examples 有关的示例构造函数，请参阅类参考主题。For an example of the constructor, see the class reference topic.

exception.span: 指定的一个或多个参数为 。

span.span: One or more of the parameters specified are .

exception.span: 在 参数中编译架构时发生的错误。

span.span: An error occurred while compiling schemas in the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddSchema(class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema schema) cil managed

param.name: schema
param.span: 一个 对象，要将其添加到用于验证的架构集。

span.span: An object to add to the set of schemas used for validation.

summary.span: 将一个 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构添加到用于验证的架构集。

span.span: Adds an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema to the set of schemas used for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法可以用于模拟的遇到内联 XML 架构中被验证的 XML 文档的效果。The method can be used to simulate the effect of encountering an inline XML schema in the XML document being validated. - 参数的目标命名空间无法与 对象已遇到的任何元素或属性的目标命名空间匹配。The target namespace of the parameter cannot match that of any element or attribute already encountered by the object. - 如果未设置验证选项，方法不执行任何操作。If the validation option is not set, the method does nothing.

exception.span: 指定的 参数为 。

span.span: The parameter specified is .

exception.span: 参数的目标命名空间与 对象已经遇到的任何元素或特性的目标命名空间匹配。

span.span: The target namespace of the parameter matches that of any element or attribute already encountered by the object.

exception.span: 参数无效。

span.span: The parameter is invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndValidation() cil managed

summary.span: 结束验证，并检查整个 XML 文档的标识约束。

span.span: Ends validation and checks identity constraints for the entire XML document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法结束验证并检查整个 XML 文档的标识约束，如果设置验证选项。The method ends validation and checks identity constraints for the entire XML document if the validation option is set.

exception.span: 在 XML 文档中发现一个标识约束错误。

span.span: An identity constraint error was found in the XML document.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute[] GetExpectedAttributes() cil managed

summary.span: 返回当前元素上下文的期望属性。

span.span: Returns the expected attributes for the current element context.

returns.span: 如果没有期望特性，则为一个 对象数组或一个空数组。

span.span: An array of objects or an empty array if there are no expected attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果方法之后，立即调用方法，将返回会出现在 XML 文档中的所有属性。If the method is called immediately after the method, all the attributes that could appear in the XML document are returned. - 如果方法在一个或多个调用之后调用方法，将返回尚未验证当前元素的属性。If the method is called after one or more calls to the method, the attributes that haven't yet been validated for the current element are returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaParticle[] GetExpectedParticles() cil managed

summary.span: 返回当前元素上下文中的期望微粒。

span.span: Returns the expected particles in the current element context.

returns.span: 如果没有期望粒子，则为一个 对象数组或一个空数组。

span.span: An array of objects or an empty array if there are no expected particles.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void GetUnspecifiedDefaultAttributes(class System.Collections.ArrayList defaultAttributes) cil managed

param.name: defaultAttributes
param.span: 一个 ，要使用以下任何特性的 对象对其进行填充，这些特性在元素上下文的验证过程中尚未遇到。

span.span: An to populate with objects for any attributes not yet encountered during validation in the element context.

summary.span: 验证默认特性的标识约束，并使用以下任何特性的 对象填充指定的 ，这些特性的默认值以前在元素上下文中从未使用 方法进行过验证。

span.span: Validates identity constraints on the default attributes and populates the specified with objects for any attributes with default values that have not been previously validated using the method in the element context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证具有的当前元素的所有属性后，必须调用方法方法。The method must be called after validating all the attributes for the current element with the method. 方法应用于确定要插入正在验证的 XML 文档的默认属性。The method should be used to determine what default attributes are to be inserted into the XML document being validated.

summary.span: 初始化 对象的状态。

span.span: Initializes the state of the object.

summary.span: 初始化 对象的状态。

span.span: Initializes the state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法才有效在构造之后立即调用对象或之后调用。The method is only valid if called immediately after the construction of an object or after a call to . ## Examples 以下示例将验证`contosoBooks.xml`文件针对`contosoBooks.xsd`架构。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

span.span: An object whose properties are set if the current element content is successfully skipped.

span.span: This parameter can be .

summary.span: 跳过当前元素内容的验证并准备 对象以验证父元素的上下文中的内容。

span.span: Skips validation of the current element content and prepares the object to validate content in the parent element's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法跳过当前元素内容的验证并准备对象，以验证父元素的上下文中的内容; 它等效于跳过当前元素的所有子级的验证，然后调用方法。The method skips validation of the current element content and prepares the object to validate content in the parent element's context; it is equivalent to skipping validation for all the children of the current element and then calling the method. - 如果已成功跳过当前元素内容，对象的 （如果指定）属性设置为。If the current element content is successfully skipped, the object's (if specified) property is set to . > [!NOTE] > 已跳过的内容未不报告任何验证错误。No validation errors are reported on skipped content.

exception.span: 未按正确的顺序调用 方法。

span.span: The method was not called in the correct sequence.

exception.span: 例如，调用 之后又调用 。

span.span: For example, calling after calling .

value.span: 一个 对象，表示所验证 XML 节点的源 URI；默认值为 。

span.span: A object representing the source URI for the XML node being validated; the default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks - URI 报告的任何源验证过程中引发。The source URI is reported by any thrown during the validation process. - 如果未设置属性、 XML 文档的文件名称是验证错误消息中。If the property is not set, the file name for the XML document is in validation error messages.

The validated attribute's value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 验证具有的当前元素的所有属性后，必须调用方法方法。The method must be called after validating all the attributes for the current element with the method. - 如果对象传递给方法，方法用于验证针对属性对象。If an object was passed to the method, the method validates the attribute against the object. - 如果在当前元素上下文中，成功验证该属性，则对象的 （如果指定） ， ， ，和属性将使用验证结果进行设置。If the attribute is successfully validated in the current element context, the object's (if specified) , , , and properties are set with the results of the validation. ## Examples 以下示例将验证`contosoBooks.xml`文件针对`contosoBooks.xsd`架构。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 验证具有的当前元素的所有属性后，必须调用方法方法。The method must be called after validating all the attributes for the current element with the method. - 如果对象传递给方法，方法用于验证针对属性对象。If an object was passed to the method, the method validates the attribute against the object. - 如果在当前元素上下文中，成功验证该属性，则对象的 （如果指定） ， ， ，和属性将使用验证结果进行设置。If the attribute is successfully validated in the current element context, the object's (if specified) , , , and properties are set with the results of the validation. ## Examples 以下示例将验证`contosoBooks.xml`文件针对`contosoBooks.xsd`架构。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果在当前上下文中，成功验证的元素名称，则对象的 （如果指定） ， ， ，和属性将使用验证结果进行设置。If the element name is successfully validated in the current context, the object's (if specified) , , , and properties are set with the results of the validation. - 如果元素名称或任何其属性的当前上下文中无效属性设置为; 否则为属性设置为。If the element name or any of its attributes are invalid in the current context, the property is set to ; otherwise the property is set to . - 如果值未传递作为参数传递给构造函数，`xsi:SchemaLocation`和`xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation`属性值将被忽略。If the value was not passed as a parameter to the constructor, `xsi:SchemaLocation` and `xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation` attribute values are ignored.

summary.span: 对于具有简单内容的元素，根据其数据类型验证元素的文本内容是否有效；对于具有复杂内容的元素，验证当前元素的内容是否完整。

span.span: Verifies if the text content of the element is valid according to its data type for elements with simple content, and verifies if the content of the current element is complete for elements with complex content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 具有简单内容的元素方法验证元素的文本内容是否符合其数据类型，并且返回的已分析的类型化的值。For elements with simple content, the method verifies that the text content of the element is valid according to its data type and returns the parsed typed value. 元素的文本内容从以前调用的结果中获取。The text content of the element is obtained from the results of previous calls to . - 具有复杂内容的元素方法验证当前元素的内容是否完整。For elements with complex content, the method verifies if the content of the current element is complete. - 如果元素具有默认值，从返回的值方法是元素的默认值。If the element has a default value, the value returned from the method is the default value for the element. - 如果对象使用构造值作为参数，应用于元素的方法检查 identity 约束规则 （如果有）。If the object was constructed with the value as a parameter, the method checks the identity constraint rules (if any) that apply to the element. - 如果在当前上下文中，成功地验证元素对象的 （如果指定） ， ，和属性将使用验证结果进行设置。If the element is successfully validated in the current context, the object's (if specified) , , and properties are set with the results of the validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果验证所依据`xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，或`xs:unique`标识约束，请勿使用方法重载。If you are validating against the `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, or `xs:unique` identity constraints, do not use the method overload. 而应调用方法并将其传递的元素的值。Instead, call the method and pass it the value of the element. 然后调用方法重载，它采用作为参数，以验证元素的文本内容是否符合其数据类型。Then call the method overload, which takes as an argument, to verify that the text content of the element is valid according to its data type. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 具有简单内容的元素方法验证元素的文本内容是否符合其数据类型，并且返回的已分析的类型化的值。For elements with simple content, the method verifies that the text content of the element is valid according to its data type and returns the parsed typed value. 从类型化的内容作为参数传递获取元素的文本内容。The text content of the element is obtained from the typed content passed as a parameter. - 如果调用以前完成方法后，引发。If calls to the method have been previously made, an is thrown. - 如果元素具有复杂内容引发。If the element has complex content an is thrown. - 如果对象使用构造值作为参数，应用于元素的方法检查 identity 约束规则 （如果有）。If the object was constructed with the value as a parameter, the method checks the identity constraint rules (if any) that apply to the element. - 如果在当前上下文中，成功地验证元素对象的 （如果指定） ， ，和属性将使用验证结果进行设置。If the element is successfully validated in the current context, the object's (if specified) , , and properties are set with the results of the validation. ## Examples 以下示例将验证`contosoBooks.xml`文件针对`contosoBooks.xsd`架构。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法应始终在此前调用。The method should always be called before . - 必须在继续进行验证的元素的内容之前调用方法。The method must be called before proceeding with validation of an element's content. - 如果元素上下文中的所有所需的属性同时存在，对象的 （如果指定）属性设置为。If all the required attributes in the element context are present, the object's (if specified) property is set to . ## Examples 以下示例将验证`contosoBooks.xml`文件针对`contosoBooks.xsd`架构。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果元素具有简单内容，文本`string`指定每次调用串联方法直到调用方法。If the element has simple content, the text `string` specified is concatenated on each call to the method until the method is called. 当方法被调用时，验证所有文本。When the method is called, all the text is validated. - 如果元素具有复杂内容，则会不发生任何文本串联。If the element has complex content, no text concatenation occurs.

summary.span: 接收架构验证过程中遇到的架构验证警告和错误。

span.span: The that receives schema validation warnings and errors encountered during schema validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有指定，则引发的所有架构验证错误值。If no is specified, an is thrown for all schema validation errors with an value of . 的验证警告不会引发值。An is not thrown for validation warnings with an value of . ## Examples 以下示例将验证`contosoBooks.xml`文件针对`contosoBooks.xsd`架构。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ ValidationEventSender { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置作为验证事件的发件人对象所发送的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object sent as the sender object of a validation event.

value.span: 一个 ；默认值为此 对象。

span.span: An ; the default is this object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 验证事件的示例，请参阅事件。For an example of a validation event, see the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ XmlResolver { void set(System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ value); };

summary.span: 设置用于解析 xs:import 和 xs:include 元素，以及 xsi:schemaLocation 和 xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation 属性的 对象。

span.span: Sets the object used to resolve xs:import and xs:include elements as well as xsi:schemaLocation and xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation attributes.

value.span: 一个 对象；默认值为 对象。

span.span: An object; the default is an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 和验证标志对象不是设置为默认值。The and validation flags of an object are not set be default. 此外，属性对象是`null`默认情况下。Additionally, the property of an object is `null` by default. 因此，在中引用的外部架构包括，导入或重新定义元素则不解析默认情况下。As a result, external schemas referenced in include, imports, or redefine elements are not resolved by default.
